alert.note: Alert for Eastern Preston; Marion; Monongalia; Preston; Ridges of Eastern Monongalia and Northwestern Preston; Wetzel (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued October 18 at 3:31AM EDT until October 18 at 10:00AM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 32. * WHERE...In Pennsylvania, Higher Elevations of Fayette and Higher Elevations of Westmoreland Counties. In West Virginia, Eastern Preston, Marion, Monongalia, Preston, Ridges of Eastern Monongalia and Northwestern Preston, and Wetzel Counties. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent water pipes from freezing; wrap or drain or allow them to drip slowly.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Preston; Marion; Monongalia; Preston; Ridges of Eastern Monongalia and Northwestern Preston; Wetzel
